Perfect Nightmare

Are dreams real? In this fantasy, dystopic , thriller, a new world is revealed and it is made up of aspects beyond imagination. Some good and some evil. Lily and Jason are set on a journey that could change the fate of their lives and the fate of others as well. They realise that their dreams become a reality surprise. It all starts sweet until the horror creeps in and together Jason and Lily enter a world full of tales and unexpected nightmares. They must save the 23 year old kidnapped Felix Jones, who is out of sight in the real world. They are determined to save him but whilst doing so, they encounter certain fears that they wish they never set their eyes on. Around them is a constant changing world and to their amazement, they discover that they have the power and ability to do and change things. Things that are impossible in the real world. Wherever they go, it’s a perfect nightmare…
